abstract: Supreme Court rules, 6-to-3, in case North Carolina State Board of Dental Examiners v Federal Trade Commission that state's dental board can be sued for driving teeth-whitening services out of business under antitrust laws.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court ruled that the North Carolina State Board of Dental Examiners may be sued for driving teeth-whitening services out of business.

headline.main: Justices Find Antitrust Law Valid Against Dental Board
headline.print_headline: Justices Find Antitrust Law Valid Against Dental Board

snippet: The Supreme Court ruled that the North Carolina State Board of Dental Examiners may be sued for driving teeth-whitening services out of business.
